entities.name: bludgers
entities.description: Bludgers are balls used in Quidditch that Beaters try to beat away from their side. (From the text: 'They’re called Bludgers.')

entities.name: beaters
entities.description: Beaters are players on each team who carry clubs to beat the Bludgers away from their side. (From the text: 'There are two Beaters on each team... Fred and George Weasley are the Gryffindor Beaters.')

entities.name: quaffle
entities.description: The Quaffle is a biggish red ball that scores goals in Quidditch. (From the text: 'Well, the Quaffle – that’s the biggish red one – is the one that scores goals.')

entities.name: chasers
entities.description: Chasers are players on each team who throw the Quaffle to each other and try to get it through the goalposts. (From the text: 'Three Chasers on each team throw the Quaffle...')

entities.name: golden snitch
entities.description: The Golden Snitch is a very small, fast ball that the Seeker must catch to end the game. (From the text: '– is the Golden Snitch...')

entities.name: seeker
entities.description: The Seeker is a player on each team who must catch the Golden Snitch to earn their team extra points. (From the text: 'But that’s what the Seeker’s got to do...')

entities.name: fred weasley
entities.description: Fred Weasley is a Beater on the Gryffindor team. (From the text: 'Fred and George Weasley are the Gryffindor Beaters.')

entities.name: george weasley
entities.description: George Weasley is a Beater on the Gryffindor team. (From the text: 'Fred and George Weasley are the Gryffindor Beaters.')

relationships.description: Beaters beat Bludgers away from their side. (From the text: 'There are two Beaters on each team, who carry clubs to beat the Bludgers away from their side.')
Chasers throw the Quaffle to each other. (From the text: 'Three Chasers on each team throw the Quaffle...')
The Seeker must catch the Golden Snitch to end the game. (From the text: 'But that’s what the Seeker’s got to do, because a game of Quidditch doesn’t end until the Snitch has been caught.')
The Seeker earns their team extra points when they catch the Golden Snitch. (From the text: 'And whichever team’s Seeker gets the Snitch earns his team an extra hundred and fifty points.')
